title: Personalized Feedback Design and Implementation in Large-Scale Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with self-directed learning
context.additional_context: Customized feedback strategy development and implementation using learning analytics tools in language education for working professionals aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect and analyze performance data for individual learners using learning analytics tools
Learners can design personalized feedback messages tailored to learner characteristics and performance levels
Learners can cultivate the ability to interpret learning analytics metrics for determining feedback frequency and topic selection
Learners can build feedback-action improvement linkage systems in small-scale digital environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
